property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.queues
property.description: The queues at root level (root is the root queue).

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.state
property.description: The state of the default queue. Can be RUNNING or STOPPED.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.acl_submit_applications
property.description: The ACL for who can submit applications to the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.acl_administer_queue
property.description: The ACL for who can administer the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.maximum-am-resource-percent
property.description: Maximum percent of resources that can be used for application masters.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.node-locality-delay
property.description: Number of missed scheduling opportunities after which the CapacityScheduler attempts to schedule rack-local containers.
